Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2009 08:31AM labontesgirl69 wrote: I saw the surgeon yesterday and he is going to to take the wait and see in 6 months option. He said that along with the calcifications there is thickening in the right breast near the nipple area. He did an exam and did not feel anything suspicious. My mom has breasts like this so this did not suprise me. Should I be confident with the surgeon's opinion or seek a second opinion?
